General.Name: Growthpoint Properties Ltd
General.Description: An international property company and the largest South African primary REIT (Real Estate Investment Trust) listed on the JSE, Growthpoint Properties is committed to delivering workspaces that positively impact the environment, as well as the physical and mental well-being of the people who occupy them. Our innovative and sustainable property offerings are designed around providing space for you and your business to thrive.
